questions.question_text: Which scenario represents a use case expand opportunity?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
This scenario represents an expand opportunity because it involves extending an existing solution to cover an additional use case (data center servers) beyond the original scope (laptops).

choices.B: supplementary training sessions are organized on existing features
choices.D: endpoint security solution extended to cover data center servers in addition to laptops
choices.A: usage KPIs are on target entering the fourth quarter

discussion.content: C. Make the story for internal use only.

Selected Answer: C
As part of the Customer Success Manager role, success stories and references are valuable in showcasing the value of the product. If a customer has a privacy policy that precludes them from public sharing, then the story should be made for internal use only.

Talking to senior management to explain the benefits of success story creation (option A) may be a good approach to take, but it may not necessarily address the customer's specific concerns about their privacy policy.

choices.B: Explain that this is a role metric that is needed to satisfy quotas.
choices.C: Make the story for internal use only.
choices.D: Offer the customer free products or services as an incentive.
choices.A: Talk to senior management to explain the benefits of success story creations.

questions.question_text: As part of the Customer Success Manager role, success stories and references are valuable in showcasing the value of the product. If a customer has a privacy policy that precludes them from public sharing, which action helps to mitigate any concerns?
Which activity should happen after successful customer value realization?

choices.B: Identify lessons learned and see how the engagement time can be shortened.
choices.D: Review usage, potential roadblocks, and bottlenecks to product engagement.
choices.C: Fully engage in a feature planning session for the future.
choices.A: Publish a case study that presents the customer success story.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. The customer has realized value, so engagement has already passed. Success should be shared.
A. Renewal is a leading indicator of adoption

Selected Answer: D
D. Product quality is a leading indicator of adoption in the healthscore. If the product is of high quality and meets the customer's needs, it is more likely to be adopted and used effectively. The healthscore is a metric used by Customer Success teams to track the health and success of their customers.

questions.question_text: What is a leading indicator of adoption in the healthscore?

choices.C: Educate the operations team on the features and capabilities of the existing solution.
choices.A: Host a discovery session with stakeholders to identify challenges and desired outcomes.
choices.B: Invites the stakeholders to attend technical training on different product use cases.
choices.D: Ensure the customer's procurement team is aware of the existing solution and its usage history.

questions.question_text: While talking to employees of a customer's front-line operations, a Customer Success Manager learns that the team is evaluating a competitive solution for an existing solution they own but use minimally. What is the next step the Customer Success Manager should take after this conversation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Host a discovery session with stakeholders to identify challenges and desired outcomes.

Hosting a discovery session with stakeholders is the best next step for the Customer Success Manager. The discovery session will allow the Customer Success Manager to gain a deeper understanding of the customer's needs, challenges, and desired outcomes. This information will help the Customer Success Manager to better understand why the customer is considering a competitive solution and what they hope to achieve with it.
